resources.string: This game is a blackjack variant that provides the player with power-ups to balance against the implicit edge of the dealer. An explanation of each power-up can be found in the "How to Play" section. I hope you have fun playing the game!

All code in this app is either original work or adapted from Stack Overflow to fit the app's needs.
 All artwork in this app is used either with explicit permission or a Creative Commons license.

Get as close to 21 as possible. Don\'t go over, or you lose!
Foresee the dealer\'s hand \nbefore you finish your turn. \nThen end whenever you\'d like!
Add a random value (0 to 4)\nto the dealer\'s running count. \nHopefully the dealer busts!
Throw away the last card if you bust. \nThink of this as carte blanche \nto take all the cards you\'d like!
Change your hand entirely. \nBe careful - you can only swap \nbefore you hit or stand!
